Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Washington/Paulina
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Washington, Damen and Madison: due to, street blockage near Washington/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Washington, Damen and Madison: due to, street blockage near Washington/Paulina.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
